entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
